mapper.select: SELECT * FROM login_record WHERE username = #{username} ORDER BY id DESC limit 1,10
SELECT * FROM option_record WHERE username = #{username} ORDER BY id DESC limit 0,8
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO login_record(username, date, ip_address) VALUES (#{username},#{date},#{ip_address})
INSERT INTO option_record(username, option_detail, option_class, date) VALUES (#{username},#{option_detail},#{option_class},#{date})
